control_attributes.control_description: The organization (a) Monitors information system accounts for [Assignment: organization-defined atypical usage]; and(b) Reports atypical usage of information system accounts to [Assignment: organization-defined personnel or roles].
control_attributes.Control_description: The information system prevents encrypted information from bypassing content-checking mechanisms by [Selection (one or more): decrypting the information; blocking the flow of the encrypted information; terminating communications sessions attempting to pass encrypted information; [Assignment: organization-defined procedure or method]].

Control Statement: The organization (a) Monitors information system accounts for [Assignment: organization-defined atypical usage]; and(b) Reports atypical usage of information system accounts to [Assignment: organization-defined personnel or roles].
